38 PKG = 'rospy_tutorials'
39 NAME = 'talker_listener_test'
40 
41 import sys, unittest, time
42 
43 import rospy, rostest
44 from std_msgs.msg import *
45 
46 class TestTalkerListener(unittest.TestCase):
47  def __init__(self, *args):
48  super(TestTalkerListener, self).__init__(*args)
49  self.success = False
50 
51  def callback(self, data):
52  print(rospy.get_caller_id(), "I heard %s"%data.data)
53  self.success = data.data and data.data.startswith('hello world')
54 
55  def test_talker_listener(self):
56  rospy.init_node(NAME, anonymous=True)
57  rospy.Subscriber("chatter", String, self.callback)
58  timeout_t = time.time() + 10.0 #10 seconds
59  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and not self.success and time.time() < timeout_t:
60  time.sleep(0.1)
61  self.assert_(self.success)
62 
63 if __name__ == '__main__':
64  rostest.rosrun(PKG, NAME, TestTalkerListener, sys.argv)
